channel.title: How do I make regular players so they cant spawn certain items?
channel.description:
This is what I'm aiming to do right now.
Giving 0+ rights to use the ::item command.
But can someone give me the code that will block 0 rights from spawning certain items that i choose & when you give the code put like 3 items on it for eg. 4151 6757 4949. Thanks alot =00

item.title: How do I make regular players so they cant spawn certain items?

item.title: How do I make regular players so they cant spawn certain items?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

easy way just make a code for the items u don’t want to be spawn by regular players
like

if(command.startswith("2425")) { return; sM("You have to be admin to spawn this item"); }

Something like that, its more for delta i think

make sure your item command isnt under this void for a start

public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
